languages.text: {n}От взгляда опытн{mf|ого|ой} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}офицера Имперского флота{/d} не укрывается фатальная уязвимость в механизме — оголенные коннекторы за тонкой металлической пластиной. Легко просунув кортик в щель, вы замыкаете их, заставив Движущую Силу прервать свой ход.{/n}

{n}As would any veteran {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}officer of the Imperial Navy{/d}, you discover a fatal vulnerability in the machine's design — exposed connectors under a thin metal plate. You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}От взгляда опытн{mf|ого|ой} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}офицера Имперского флота{/d} не укрывается фатальная уязвимость в механизме — оголенные коннекторы за тонкой металлической пластиной. Легко просунув кортик в щель, вы замыкаете их, заставив Движущую Силу прервать свой ход.{/n}

You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie jeder andere erfahrene {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Offizier der imperialen Kriegsflotte{/d} entdeckst auch du eine tödliche Schwäche im Design der Maschine – freiliegende Konnektoren unter einer dünnen Metallplatte. Du steckst deinen Dolch in den Riss und verursachst einen Kurzschluss, der den Fluss der Antriebskraft aufhält.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As would any veteran {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}officer of the Imperial Navy{/d}, you discover a fatal vulnerability in the machine's design — exposed connectors under a thin metal plate. You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du entdeckst eine tödliche Schwäche im Design der Maschine – freiliegende Konnektoren unter einer dünnen Metallplatte. Du steckst deinen Dolch in den Riss und verursachst einen Kurzschluss, der den Fluss der Antriebskraft aufhält.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout vétéran de la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Marine Impériale{/d} discernerait une faille fatale dans la machine, et vous ne faites pas exception à la règle : vous repérez immédiatement des connecteurs exposés sous une fine plaque métallique. Vous glissez votre lame dans la fissure pour provoquer un court-circuit qui interrompt le flux de Force Motrice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As would any veteran {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}officer of the Imperial Navy{/d}, you discover a fatal vulnerability in the machine's design — exposed connectors under a thin metal plate. You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout vétéran de la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Marine Impériale{/d} discernerait une faille fatale dans la machine, et vous ne faites pas exception à la règle : vous repérez immédiatement des connecteurs exposés sous une fine plaque métallique. Vous glissez votre lame dans la fissure pour provoquer un court-circuit qui interrompt le flux de Force Motrice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}身为{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}经验丰富的帝国海军军官{/d}，你一眼就看到了这台机器设计的致命漏洞——连接器完全暴露在薄薄的金属板下。你将匕首刺入金属板间隙，造成短路，停止了源力的流动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As would any veteran {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}officer of the Imperial Navy{/d}, you discover a fatal vulnerability in the machine's design — exposed connectors under a thin metal plate. You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你发现了这台机器设计中的致命漏洞：某个连接器暴露在薄薄的金属板下。你将匕首刺入金属板间隙，造成短路，停止了原初动力的流动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}帝国海軍の熟練士官{/d}として当然のことだが、あなたは機械の設計に致命的な脆弱性を発見した。薄い金属板の下でコネクタがむき出しになっているのだ。ダガーを割れ目に滑り込ませ、サーキットをショートさせて 原動力の流れを止める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As would any veteran {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}officer of the Imperial Navy{/d}, you discover a fatal vulnerability in the machine's design — exposed connectors under a thin metal plate. You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}機械の設計に致命的な脆弱性を発見したーー薄い金属板の下にコネクタがむき出しになっているのだ。ダガーを割れ目に入り込ませ、サーキットをショートさせて 原動力の流れを止める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Como {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}oficial de la Armada Imperial{/d} veteran{mf|o|a}, descubres un fallo crítico en el diseño de la máquina: conectores expuestos bajo una fina placa de metal. Introduces tu daga en la abertura y provocas un cortocircuito que altera el flujo de la Fuerza Motriz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As would any veteran {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}officer of the Imperial Navy{/d}, you discover a fatal vulnerability in the machine's design — exposed connectors under a thin metal plate. You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Descubres un fallo crítico en el diseño de la máquina: conectores expuestos bajo una fina placa de metal. Introduces tu daga en la abertura y provocas un cortocircuito que altera el flujo de la Fuerza Motriz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her kıdemli {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}İmparatorluk Donanması subayının{/d} yapacağı gibi, makinenin tasarımında ciddi bir açık fark ediyorsun: İnce bir metal levhanın altında apaçık duran birkaç bağlayıcı. Hançerini usulca aralığa geçiriyor ve kısa devreye sebep olarak Devinim Gücü'nün akışını durduruyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As would any veteran {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}officer of the Imperial Navy{/d}, you discover a fatal vulnerability in the machine's design — exposed connectors under a thin metal plate. You slide your dagger into the crack and cause a short circuit that halts the flow of the Motive Force.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Her kıdemli {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}İmparatorluk Donanması subayının{/d} yapacağı gibi, makinenin tasarımında ciddi bir açık fark ediyorsun: İnce bir metal levhanın altında apaçık duran birkaç bağlayıcı. Hançerini usulca aralığa geçiriyor ve kısa devreye sebep olarak Devinim Gücü'nün akışını durduruyorsun.{/n}
